website_summaries.verdict: Not the most spacious or sturdy model available, but it offers hanging and storage space that make it worth considering for tight areas and tight budgets.
pros: Offers ample space with a variety of hooks, including six that slide
Has three shelves that are ideal for shoes and more
The 23-inch width is perfect for limited space
cons: The structure isn't quite as sturdy as higher-priced options

customer_reviews.title: I am VERY unhappy with the quality of this product ...
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY unhappy with the quality of this product. The pre-drilled holes do not line up. So much so, that the metal shelves warp slightly when you tighten the screws. Furthermore, I got down to the last screw and it didn't fit. I had to take the whole thing a part to send back. I bought this during the "Deals Day" paying a much cheaper price. I couldn't imagine paying the ridiculous amount they originally wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small spaces; I don't care too much for the hooks though.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my studio apartment and the size is just right because it doesn't take up too much space. The only two things I was *slightly* disappointed by were: 1. The hooks for the coats are not soldered/fixed to the bar, you hook them on and they swing since they don't clip or anything... 2. We had a very hard time putting the last bolt in up top in the back because the metal was far too tight and we couldn't line the holes up (but this was probably just user error). I recommend not tightening the other side too much before you screw in the last side.
customer_reviews.author: AMBER

customer_reviews.title: Suits my needs but not impressive
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't consider this a high-quality item, just something that will do the job on a budget. Some of the pieces required quite a bit of force to assemble. I'm the type of person who enjoys assembling things and has a lot of patience. If you're not that type of person, be prepared to be aggravated. It's not an item I would dare sit on, but I wouldn't be worried that it will topple or bend with six pairs of work boots on it. It won't be lasting a life time, but it does keep the shoes organized.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: I understand why this product is priced as cheap as ...
customer_reviews.text: I understand why this product is priced as cheap as it is. Putting it together was a nightmare. The holes on two of my poles we're off center and would not match up with the screw holes. One of my shelves had a stripped screw insert. The only reason the thing is even together and standing is because I own power tools and know how to use them. Buyer beware if you are looking for quality craftsmanship!!!
customer_reviews.author: Edna Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great little coat rack I was nervous about its stability at first and planned to anchor it to the wall, but we haven't gotten around to it yet and it's holding up just fine!
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Love this hall tree coat rack
customer_reviews.text: Love this hall tree coat rack. It has room enough to fit about 12 blouses and 12 pairs of pants without crushing them together resulting in wrinkles. Hate wrinkles! Enough room for about 12 pairs of shoes (depending what kink of shoes you have). PERFECT for what I needed it for. It isn't too heavy either, but is real sturdy. Highly recommend this coat rack.
customer_reviews.author: CCH

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Relatively sturdy. Easy to assemble. Unlike most coat/utility racks, this one fits in small spaces. It's not horrible looking, but not great looking either. I wish they had a similar sized item that was visually more appealing. But for the money, it's a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Only Originals

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Sturdy. Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Took 30 mins to assemble. If you do it right and all the screws are tight this thing is pretty sturdy. One page of instructions and pretty easy to read. I read a review where person said they put one purse on and it fell over ? Well then you didn’t put it together correctly. All screws in , with washers. Righty tighty. 5stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cher Bear

customer_reviews.title: ... sit on when putting on their shoes and I'm disappointed that this shoe bench doesn't allow that
customer_reviews.text: I originally wanted a hall tree that people could sit on when putting on their shoes and I'm disappointed that this shoe bench doesn't allow that, but I love how it helps organize my space and make getting out of the house quicker and simpler on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble if you got power tool
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble if you got power tool. Much more difficult to put together with tool provided. However, it is as described. Make sure to read measurements as the pic makes it looks larger than it is. Overall good for price and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice shoe rack / coat rack. It's the perfect size for our small apartment. It took me about two hours to leisurely put it together - for someone focusing and who is handy, I expect it would take about an hour or less. It's fairly sturdy for our purposes - keys, hats, shoes and some light jackets. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sara T.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty durable, and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my entry way beside the front door. So convenient to have a place for the kids to hang their backpacks and jackets, and put their shoes right when they walk in the house. Pretty durable, and easy to put together, and it looks nice in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bratcher

customer_reviews.title: Cute, easy setup, works like it should.
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 stars but one of the screw holes needed burrs rubbed down before the screw would go in the hole. Cute, serviceable, not for long coats or large hoodies. Jackets and sweaters work great.
customer_reviews.author: jennamc

customer_reviews.title: Can't use it because it can't be put together and even if it were put together I would be really disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: The areas where the screws were supposed to go into either wasn't threaded or had plastic or paint in them and the screws wouldn't fit in. the pieces that screw together were really bendy/cheap looking. Can't use it because it can't be put together and even if it were put together I would be really disappointed in this product. Wanted to send it back for a refund but due to moving delays, I missed the deadline. Don't Purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do enjoy this product
customer_reviews.text: I do enjoy this product, while it's not perfect, it fits my needs well. It's small enough to have in my entry hallway. It was trickier to assemble that I thought & I'm pretty good at assembling the worst of things. Double check you have the leg holes facing the right way, 1 shelf is smaller than the other so double check that before you start screwing, and the top rack was hard to force into the holes at the back. I wish the rack where the hooks lay was a bit higher as coats tend to drag a bit on the bench. It's not the cutest piece ever, but serves it purpose well!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful if pieces actually fit together had to send it ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful if pieces actually fit together had to send it back because the screws for the shelves did not line up correctly
customer_reviews.author: illen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product. I didn't buy it to sit on ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product. I didn't buy it to sit on so it works for what I need. If anything is hung on the rack it needs to be secured to the wall or else it will tip. Not really solid but easy assembly and it works to hold shoes, keys and dog treat on the seat. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M. Stoll

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was really simple to put together (about 20 minutes) and it looks great in my entryway. It's surprisingly sturdy for the price, and while I definitely don't recommend sitting on the shelves, they do support all our stuff and a 20 lb cat who has decided it's his new favorite napping area.
customer_reviews.author: Julesie_O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: It fits snugly behind the front door with maybe an inch or two clearance when the door is completely open. There’s ample amount of hooks and shelf space for our (two of us) daily used jackets and the shoes that we wear most often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This rack was impossible to assemble. The screws wouldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This rack was impossible to assemble. The screws wouldn't screw into the holes. I had to send it back. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and dirty shoes and clipboard
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a man who works in an industrial job. He puts his heavy coats and sweatshirts on it, and dirty shoes and clipboard. Holds up really well! Pretty easy to put together, and seems more sturdy than I thought it would! Have it in a corner between the wall and a bookcase.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: This is a great space saver for my small apartment
customer_reviews.text: This is a great space saver for my small apartment. It holds plenty of items. I did make a shelf for the top part instead of a hanger and put a basket on the top. I also bolted the rack to the wall. It was easy to put together and was exactly what I was looking for especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad But Could Be Better
customer_reviews.text: Okay for the price. However, the assembly was difficult. The pieces fit very snugly and you have to really jam all the bars into place. The feet of my stand also are not all level. This was easily fixed with felt feet but one shouldn't have to get additional items to make sure your furniture isn't rickety. Also, since a measurement for the top bar isn't given, it has a depth of about 6 inches. Please plan your hangers accordingly. Despite these flaws, I am still keeping this item because I like the style and being a poor grad student, this serves my meager purposes. However, I wish this item were a little better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Ying

customer_reviews.title: Coat rack
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a small space. Not too crazy about the hooks because they come off easily but other than that it serves its purpose
customer_reviews.author: Mireya Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, pretty easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some place to keep clothes I wanted to rewear, where they could get some air. I love this piece. Assembly is pretty simple, and they include the only tool you need. I used a drill because I had it and I’m impatient, but it’s not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise though it's fine just some dimensions are too small
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to the photo, normal sized hangers really don't fit well. Someone else's review commented asking if this was for kids because you can't hand adult coats on the hooks without them dragging. Otherwise though it's fine just some dimensions are too small. Giving it to my boyfriend who could use a shoe rack and use the hooks to hang his dog leash and baseball caps. Not for coats.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Knutson

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It was a pain in the A** ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It was a pain in the A** to put together because the directions are not super clear and none of the parts are actually labeled. Once I finally got the finished product up and going it looks amazing and perfect for keeping our entryway in order. I would totally buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together, was just what i needed for my space, was a price i could afford hooks hold my keys so I didnt have to put holes in the wall along with kids coats and I put an ikea mat underneath to catch water from wet shoes
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Not as I expected
customer_reviews.text: One of the screws would not go in all the way -- and the instructions could have been better. It is flimsy and
customer_reviews.author: Malin

customer_reviews.title: Quality could have been better!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good designed bench shoe rack. The only problem is the quality isn’t sturdy enough. You can’t hang your heavy winter coats on it. I tried hanging two of my coats on the bar but it couldn’t hold the weight and tilted to the front. I ordered it specially for that purpose. Otherwise, it’s a good product for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Rischa

customer_reviews.title: For the price..... its ok.
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to assemble. I did it by myself in 30 minutes or less. Its looks nice and you get what you paid for. I wouldn't sit on it. I gave it 4 stars because one of the metal tubes had a split. I could just still use it anyway so didnt return it. I would recommend it to someone who is looking for something to just do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Vinacat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together took me about 20 mins
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised!! Fits space perfectly. Easy to put together took me about 20 mins. Works for me just wish it was a little sturdier but I knew going in for the price it would not be as heavy as a more expensive one but I'm happy with it over all.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: No Issues
customer_reviews.text: Located in my washroom, used to hang wet clothes. So far no issues, I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Durability and size very good
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and was easy to assemble. Also sturdy and works good for organizing many different things
customer_reviews.author: Loraine

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. It makes our door way look so ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It makes our door way look so much nicer and organized. My husband, however, cursed a lot while trying to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant - picture does not look how it does in real life. Complements every room and has a lot of space for hanging clothes. Easy to put together, took me about 30 minutes
customer_reviews.author: good2us

customer_reviews.title: Great piece, Perfect size for entryway
customer_reviews.text: Great piece, Perfect size for entryway. I live in a 2 bedroom apartment so I wanted something that could provide a little storage off the floor for shoes by the door, and I love the shelf for keys, mail, purse, etc.
customer_reviews.author: dunc

customer_reviews.title: I was worried about how sturdy it would be but I have a heavy duty ...
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about how sturdy it would be but I have a heavy duty carrhart on it along with another winter coat, two jackets, and three hoodies on it and it's been holding up great. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: I liked the shoe rack part
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shoe rack part, but trying to hang my coats, the hangers don’t align with the metal and I just end up only using the hooks for hats and small sweaters.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Seibert

customer_reviews.title: What I needed
customer_reviews.text: Took about 30 - 45 minutes to put together, no special tools required. For the price, just what I wanted. Seems sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wells

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good looking for its price.
customer_reviews.text: Decently simple to put together (although it somehow didn't come together perfectly on top, no matter what I did), but looks great. It houses my coats, my hats and my shoes in a clean matter. Much better than the coat rack I gave away. Well worth the price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S.

customer_reviews.title: Takes a heavy load and is perfect for a small area.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted and fits my space perfectly while doing everything and more than what I wanted. It is light and assembled easily enough for my husband the handyman.
customer_reviews.author: E Vorster

customer_reviews.title: Junk buyer beware see photos
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware do not buy this product obviously there are no quality control in place when manufactured my parts did not line up and as you can see the welds or poorly done
customer_reviews.author: James J.

customer_reviews.text: Fits behind the living room door. Perfect for the kids to set shoes or bookbags.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty simple to put together and it fits perfectly in my small entryway. Great price for a hall tree. I wish the top bar was a shelf, I think it would be more functional than the bar, but it still works and looks great. The bottom shelves have good space and the bench seems pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: For the price is wasn't bad. The bench was scuffed up when I opened the box. Easy to assemble. Doesn't seem to be very steady. But, it will work.
customer_reviews.author: chasity

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I put this together in about 45 minutes, exactly what I needed. Great for the price, very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of clothes!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It actually holds way more than I expected! It’s adora and makes my room look like a little boutique. I may be buying another. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Freckled Jewl

customer_reviews.title: The shelf itself is not sturdy enough to sit on it
customer_reviews.text: A bit wiggly as the top is not attached to the wall, but it's kind of you get what you pay for. The shelf itself is not sturdy enough to sit on it, but that's fine as we put bags and other no so heavy stuff on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ofir Germansky

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: Good enough. It was easy to put together and does its job, it's light hollow metal, not heavy and not made for heavy stuff.
customer_reviews.author: R.Burns

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful storage rack
customer_reviews.text: I needed an extra area for shirts and other things. This is perfect! Sturdy and easy to assemble. Beautiful. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Product is extremely light and flimsy. Definitely not what I was hoping for. I guess you get what you pay for. I gave this one a shot...it's goin to the goodwill after I get a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf......It is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Lollar

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to a weekly rental guest room
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to a weekly rental guest room. Seems sturdy enough for hanging a few garments. Shelves are nice. Takes up only a little space.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Welsh

customer_reviews.title: I like it for the two of us
customer_reviews.text: This is little and subtle. I like it for the two of us. Especially the shelf. If you are looking for a super big one this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the hooks
customer_reviews.text: Holes to put together are a bit off so had to struggle with a couple screws. It's not super strong so I would not suggest using it as a seat - ever! Love that the hooks are optional to add!
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect.. I put it behind the main door ...
customer_reviews.text: My new home doesn't have a jacket/shoe closet, so I had to improvise. This is perfect..I put it behind the main door and it blends well. Looks cool too..got lot of compliments on how simple and cute it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good producr
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It's strong, sturdy and has good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Georgette

customer_reviews.title: Seemed a little flimsy and was expecting a little bit of a better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe worth $20. Seemed a little flimsy and was expecting a little bit of a better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: this thing is perfect for what I need. fits perfectly in the spot that I have for it. would buy again! lots of room for different stuff
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Davis

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: We just assembled. Looks good so far! It's in new house, so we haven't tried it out much yet. We'll let you know when we've used it for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: GA Gal

customer_reviews.title: The coat rack is definitely serving its purpose. I ...
customer_reviews.text: The coat rack is definitely serving its purpose. I did have an issue. One of the bottom pegs/stoppers will not screw into the bottom. Not sure if something is wrong with where you screw it into the device.
customer_reviews.author: LARHONDA PIERCE

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product! Easy to put together and can hold a lot of items. I wish it had a shelf above the hooks, though!
customer_reviews.author: Mia Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Broken rack out of the box, but it's cute.
customer_reviews.text: Broken second rack out of the box, but don't want to send it back. It's cute and serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my space. I spray painted all but the wood shelf before assembly. Just wanted an off the wall color! Very easy to assemble alone.
customer_reviews.author: KELLY ELSKES

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use in travel trailer for more hangers/storage. Lightweight but very sturdy. Fits space perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: jellymouse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and looks great. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gyd

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together and works perfectly to hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and works perfectly to hold my kids backpacks, gloves, hats, and coats. Fits nicely in the small space I have available! Only thing is it feels a little wobbly sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and not easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: As pictured. Flimsy and not easy to put together. It noticeably leans forward with the weight of my coats.
customer_reviews.author: 32btodhs

customer_reviews.title: metal rack on top didnt fit into the little slots ...
customer_reviews.text: metal rack on top didnt fit into the little slots without us having to try to bend it a little. I understand you want the fit to be tight but when you receive it a little bent it makes it very difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hall tree
customer_reviews.text: Hall tree looks great but when putting together we had to drill out screw holes to make it fit toghther properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: very cheaply made, 3 outta 4 holes didn't line up and I had to improvise just to get it together, once I did it's very shaky. Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: not very sturdy but looks nice and fits its purpose.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I was looking for. I have a small space in bedroom so the depth and width was perfect. Plus it hold a lot of items.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. Looks elegant. Super handy to have by the door. Encourages guests to park their feet in my barefoot-enforced home.
customer_reviews.author: Yoo Ar.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, easy to put together, as described...a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Jodie L Talley

customer_reviews.title: ... followed the instructions on assembly and Everything went together nicely. I ordered this for a small guest room
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions on assembly and Everything went together nicely. I ordered this for a small guest room . It fit perfectly and was just the right item for guests to use . : )

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Fairly easy to assemble. Very nice finished product.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: A steal deal for this perfect coat rack. Love it!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. Very sturdy. An attractive addition to my entry way.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the space I had. Much sturdier than I was expecting.

customer_reviews.text: Very good design. Had some issues with bolt threads. Was worried it would not be stout enough for husband's use. So far so good.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I would recommend though.
customer_reviews.text: Had a difficult time assembling as I could not get the shelves to line up. Eventually had to redrill to get the one screw to fit. Not entirely stable, but does the job I purchased it for. Not sure I would recommend though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a reasonable price. Only thing disappointing were the scratches I found on the wood shelf. By the time I got to that step I didn’t want to deal with taking it back apart and the exchange process.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: ... rickety and not as wide as it looks but easy to
customer_reviews.text: a little rickety and not as wide as it looks but easy to assemble

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I wanted fit perfectly and was easy to put together.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice overall design hangars do not fit correctly under the rod with the books.

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: Broken , requires welding to correct, coukdny get back in box properly for return without damaging box or item pieces

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and practical
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece. Sturdy when everything put together and tightened. Instructions could have been a little more clear.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful idea
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good bench such a good purchase great for the money and helps organize your room my boyfriend put it together in 15 minutes very functional and sturdy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item was defective. I had to return it. I couldn't put it together.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice coat rack.The directions are a little vague but once it is all together it is attractive and functional
customer_reviews.author: karen mcsherry

customer_reviews.title: Stripped holes.
customer_reviews.text: Somehow the two of the holes for the bolts were stripped. Otherwise I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: GlassJars

customer_reviews.title: Easy to make and beautiful addition to apt.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Nice material. Perfect size for my small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: JLU

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Worth every penny to have all the shoes and coats and back packs in one place without all the clutter!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elisha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice coat and shoe rack. Easy to assemble and looks nice in our entryway.
customer_reviews.author: Lee John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great where I needed it and makes it more organized. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase Langria products again.
customer_reviews.text: The picture did not accurately describe the bench, in my opinion. It was very light-weight and difficulty to put together. Most of the screws would not tighten. Disappointed. **The company was very helpful to right this wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holes drilled crooked
customer_reviews.text: Cute and a good size but the directions are poorly laid out (what would be 2-3 steps is all in one diagram) and one of the poles we received was drilled crooked so we weren't able to get the screws in and ended up having to glue it together to make sure it was sturdy. Also the paint layer was so thick on it that we had to hammer parts into one another. It was so difficult that I would think it was user error other than literally yesterday I put together a 6ft tall 200lb cabinet in under an hour, so this small coat tree shouldn't have been so difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Kameo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm VERY careful about the weight distribution but so far, it's been good
customer_reviews.author: Elise

product_meta.title: LANGRIA Entryway Coat Rack Metal Standing Hall Tree with 2-Tier Grid Wire Shoe Rack, Wooden Bench and Hat Umbrella Holder Features 5 Hooks (Black)
feature_bullets: STURDY DESIGN: the LANGRIA entryway coat rack has a durable metal body, grid wire shoe rack, and wooden bench that each hold 22 lbs.
MULTIPURPOSE ORGANIZER: this 3-in-1 hall tree can be used as a coat rack with its vertical bars and 5 sliding hooks, shoe rack, and bench
SMART STORAGE: use your hall tree for storing shoes, bags, coats, scarfs and more; never find yourself in a messy room again
CLASSIC DESIGN: with its black coated metal base and wooden bench, our garment rack is a beautiful asset to your hallway’s furniture
EASY ASSEMBLY: easily put your coat rack together without any tools by following the included instructions; easy to clean with damp cloth
